channel.title: Following a Successful Agm on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in Following a Successful Agm on UN-aligned

item.title: Onward and upwards: UN-aligned priorities for 2025
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: Following a successful AGM, during which Adrian Liberto was confirmed as Chair and Partho Chatterjee as Vice-Chair, UN-aligned highlights some of the priorities for the remainder of 2025
